sentences.sentence: They will be comfortable with responsibility in a way non-Alphas can never be.
sentences.translation: 他们乐于承担责任的能力是普通人永远都达不到的。

sentences.sentence: Alphas reach the top ranks in large organizations because they are natural leaders.
sentences.translation: 他们在大型机构身居高位是因为他们天生就是领袖人物。

sentences.sentence: A lot of questions came out of this: are all of the alphas working together towards a common goal?
sentences.translation: 这就引出了许多问题：是不是所有的阿尔法都为了一个共同的目标工作？
